2 Data Science Toolbox 2.1 What is Data Science?

2 Data Science Toolbox To do Deadline - First week of Aug Gather old notes from class and code it here review index file and page 1 - grammar and storyline Find a way to publish the book once everything is completed Good luck. 2.1 What is Data Science? Create a Venn Diagram library(tidyverse) library(ggforce) VennDS <- tibble( x = c(0, 1,-1), y = c(-0.5, 1, 1), tx = c(0, 3,-3), ty = c(-3, 3, 1.3), cat = c('Variety', 'Velocity', 'Volume') ) ggplot(VennDS, aes( x0 = x , y0 = y, r = 1.5, fill = cat )) + geom_circle( alpha = 0.25, size = 1, color = "transparent", show.legend = FALSE) + geom_text(aes(x = -1.5 , y = 1, label = "Volume"), size = 5) + geom_text(aes(x = 1.5 , y = 1, label = "Velocity"), size = 5) + geom_text(aes(x = 0 , y = -1, label = "Variety"), size = 5) + geom_text(aes(x = 0 , y = .75, label = "Big Data"), size = 5)
